snippet: Revenue increased $8.2 billion or 13% with growth across each of our segments. Intelligent Cloud revenue increased driven by Azure. Productivity and Business Processes revenue increased driven by Microsoft 365 Commercial cloud. More Personal Computing revenue increased driven by Search and news advertising. ... snippet: Vibe code on Shopify? Summer '25 Edition delivers: Our latest version of Markets and Catalogs APIs allows you to build support for new Markets, including retail, B2B, and international. This update puts sophisticated market segmentation and catalog management at your fingertips, giving merchants more control over their global product presence.
